description: Create a function named factorial to calculate the factorial of a number. The function should print the result of factorial(20)
javascript: function factorial(n) { if (n === 0) return 1; else return n * factorial(n - 1); } console.log(factorial(20));

description: Create a function named sum which contains two parameters a,b. Print the results for sum(5,6)
javascript: function sum(a,b) { return a + b; } console.log(sum(5,6));
